text: Motion

Hehe
I can’t believe I was able to buy this at this timing......!
Good for you, getting what you wanted.

It’s a limited edition item from "Mira☆Mira"!
It’s a rare find that you can only get now......!
Haha, it was lucky that we were close to the venue.

Since it’s something you like, Fuyuko,
I have to keep an eye on it too.

......You’re just like,
Mei in that way.

Fuyuko also thinks that if she is watching it,
it must be interesting, so she watches it too......

I’m your manager,
and Mei is your unit member, that might be why.
That doesn’t mean you have to share the same hobbies──
Haha......

Fuyuko, no matter how you became an idol,
I think you would have done well.
......What’s with that all of a sudden?

I was talking about it with Mei,
so it just came to mind.

......Well, maybe.
At least I’d be much more comfortable than I am now.

I’d be teamed up with someone who suits me better,
and be a more "proper" idol.
......Do you really think so?

I do.
......Well, but......

It’s too late now, right?
......The Fuyuko now is still Fuyuko.
Yeah... that’s true.
